chat_history.message:
Hello, 
My iPhone 13 Pro has the above problem. 
Dear Customer Service from Backmarkt,
I hope you are doing well. I am writing to request a tax-free form for a purchase I made in your store.
Purchase details:
Purchased date: May 16, 2024
Order number/Invoice number: 40570399
Purchased items: iPhone 13 Pro 128GB- Silver - No contract
Total expenses: €551.94
I recently left Germany and at the customs point at the airport, I was informed that I need a tax-free form to request a value-added tax refund. The customs officers have already stamped my receipt.
Could you please send me the required tax-free form so that I can complete my application for value-added tax refund? If you require any additional information or documents from me, please let me know.
Thank you for your support.
Best regards,
Slim Abid
015753061271
Kolpingring 18A EnOcean GmbH 82041 Oberhaching Germany

Dear ecomobile

Can you please issue the customer with the document he needs?

Regards,
Ebru from the Back Care Team

Dear Backcare,

Attached is the invoice.

Regards,
RK
